R

Rating - Enum in domain
The rating of a point of interest (from 1 to 5)
RatingDB - Class in dataAccess
Stores and retrieves ratings from the database
RatingDB(String) - Constructor for class dataAccess.RatingDB
 
recommend(User) - Method in class recommender.Recommender
Performs a recommendation using first collaborative filtering and then content-based filtering if not enough recommendations were produced before.
recommendCollaborative(User) - Method in class recommender.Recommender
Performs the collaborative filtering recommendation, based on user ratings.
recommendContentBased(User) - Method in class recommender.Recommender
Performs the content-based approach, based on the similarity between POI characteristics and user interests.
RecommendedPointOfInterest - Class in domain
A point of interest that is recommended to the user.
RecommendedPointOfInterest(long, String, Location, String, String, int, String, POIProfile) - Constructor for class domain.RecommendedPointOfInterest
 
Recommender - Class in recommender
The recommender in which the tourist recommendations are calculated.
Recommender(PointDB, RatingDB) - Constructor for class recommender.Recommender
Creates a recommender which has access on the ratings and POI database.
recommendForCategory(User, TouristCategory) - Method in class recommender.Recommender
Performs a category-specific recommendation, so only points of interest are returned that match the given tourist category
refresh(Collection<Refreshable>) - Method in class recommender.POIDataModel
 
refresh(Collection<Refreshable>) - Method in class recommender.ProfileSimilarity
 
removePreference(long, long) - Method in class recommender.POIDataModel
 
resetContext(long) - Method in class service.agent.AgentHandler
Resets the current context of the conversation.
